headline: Apollo Names Brian Chu Head of Apollo Portfolio Performance Solutions
summary: Aaron Miller Named Chairman of APPS, Expected to Retire at End of 2026 NEW YORK, July 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that Brian Chu has joined the firm as a Partner and Head of Apollo Portfolio Performance Solutions (APPS).
